@swyx @Chr_Bach The term #jamstack tries to describe something more than is often implied by they term "static site". Mostly due to the rich ecosystem of tools and services now available to make them so much richer and dynamic, and less "static". Some thoughts: https://t.co/VrY0qAxhN7
